name: Michael T Hosley
coverLetter: I'm a self sufficient trimmer with my own transport, my own tent and gear. I will gladly take any meals offered, but can easily prepare my own and have no special dietary requirements- team player - ready to leave now for the season!  I can bring one other person and I'm also a security guard with training,  57 years old, 40 years experience in the industry, delivery, growing, and trimming 5 seasons,
